abstract: An agreement in principle was reached on a misdemeanor criminal charge related to the marketing of the antipsychotic drug Risperdal.
snippet: An agreement in principle was reached on a misdemeanor criminal charge related to the marketing of the antipsychotic drug Risperdal.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson reached an agreement in principle to settle a misdemeanor criminal charge related to the marketing of its antipsychotic drug Risperdal, the company said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday.

headline.main: Johnson & Johnson to Settle Charge Over Drug’s Marketing
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson to Settle Charge Over Drug’s Marketing
